root.name: The Land Before Time Return to the Great Valley
root.description: Overview The Land Before Time: Return To The Great Valley is a platformer released for the Sony PlayStation console in 2000. The game allows players to take control of characters from the popular films (specifically Littlefoot, Cera, Ducky and Spike) and guide them safely back to the Great Valley by navigating a series of simple levels using basic platforming techniques.
